Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.bol.krzysztof.lab2.models.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the game logic and controlling game objects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Krzysztof BÃ³l

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameObject food
      Food that can be eaten by snake.
      private int FOOD_SIZE
      Integer representing the size of one body segment.
      private int GAME_CANVAS_HEIGHT
      Height of the canvas that game is drawn on.
      private int GAME_CANVAS_WIDTH
      Width of the canvas that game is drawn on.
      private boolean isGameOver
      True when the game is over.
      private Player player
      Player that is playing the game.
      private Snake snake
      Snake that is controlled by player.
      private double SPEED_STEP
      Double representing value that is added to the snake's speed when collision with food occured.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int gameCanvasHeight,
            int gameCanvasWidth)
        Constructs Game object with canvas size specified by parameters.
        Parameters:
        gameCanvasHeight - canvas height
        gameCanvasWidth - canvas width

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates Game object. Moves the snake and checks if any collision occured. If collision with borders of the canvas occured, changes isGameOver value to true. If collision with food occured, generates new food and increments player score. If collision with snake body occured, changes isGameOver value to true.

      • generateFood

        private void generateFood()
        Generates new food at random position.

      • processDirectionChange

        public void processDirectionChange(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode key)
        Processes snake direction change.
        Parameters:
        key - KeyCode value of pressed key

      • getSnake

        public Snake getSnake()
        Returns the private field snake.
        Returns:
        Snake

      • getFood

        public GameObject getFood()
        Returns the private field food.
        Returns:
        GameObject object representing food

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Returns the private field food.
        Returns:
        Player object representing a player

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Starts (or restarts) the game. Sets isGameOver value to false. Creates new snake and food. Sets player score to 0.

      • collisionCheck

        private boolean collisionCheck(GameObject obj1,
                               GameObject obj2)
        Checks if a collision between two objects occured.
        Parameters:
        obj1 - first object
        obj2 - second object
        Returns:
        true if collision occured

      • collisionCheck

        private boolean collisionCheck(GameObject obj)
        Checks if a collision between an object and canvas borders occured.
        Parameters:
        obj - snake body part
        Returns:
        true if collision occured

        Sets the isGameOver value to true.

        Returns the private field isGameOver.
        Returns:
